tweet_text: @duerenavoss @blood_slut444 yeah most credit cards will easily dispute and cancel charges for you. it's much safer to use online and even in person. plus if it's like an online order or something, credit cards usually don't disperse the money as fast as debit cards, so they can cancel before it evens ships.
